# Membes AMS Online Training

Completing the online training is an essential first step in getting started with Membes AMS.

We highly recommend nominating at least two team members who will complete all the training courses and become your ‘Office Champions’.

Benefits of Online Training:

- Better understanding of Membes AMS for smoother day-to-day operations.
- Making the most of all the Membes AMS features.
- Increased confidence in managing your website effectively.
- Faster troubleshooting and issue resolution.

## What’s included in the online training

The content is divided into four courses, covering the following topics:

### Introduction to Membes AMS

1. Welcome to Membes: Platform Overview & Key Concepts
2. Accessing Membes: Logging In & Using the Support Hub
3. Setting Up Admin Users & Managing Access Permissions
4. Navigating the Account Menu & Shortcuts

### Configuration

1. Configuration Overview: Where to Start & What's Inside
2. Settings & Organisation Details
3. Managing Image Assets: Sizes, Formats & Upload Tips
4. Finance Setup: Payment Gateways & Transaction Surcharges
5. Stop and Think: Key Data Considerations Before Setup
6. Understanding Membership Price Periods
7. Creating Membership Types: Rolling, Cyclical, Subscription
8. Creating Custom Profile Fields
9. Importing Data: CSV Formatting, Mapping & Auditing
10. Integration Setup: Connect Third-Party Tools
11. Using Membes Multilingual Features
12. Training Your AI Assistant in Membes

### Association Management System (AMS)

1. AMS Overview & Dashboard Customisation
2. Understanding a Profile
3. Creating New Profiles: Manually or via System Actions
4. Profile Interactions
5. Setting Up and Managing Profile Relationships
6. Viewing a Member Profile as a Member
7. Reporting: Exporting Profile Data Safely & Effectively
8. Creating & Using Saved Filters
9. INTEL Overview: Reporting Tools & Filters
10. Managing Profiles: Merge, Delete, Archive & Duplicates
11. Creating & Managing Profile Groups
12. Generating membership renewals
13. Managing Renewals: EFT payments, Reports & Manual Processing
14. Financial Management: Invoices, Payments & Exports
15. Setting up and Managing Member Payment Plans
16. Payment Plans: Member Experience
17. Setting up and Managing Subscription Memberships
18. Subscription Memberships: Member Experience
19. Discount Codes
20. Event Management: Overview & Admin Tools
21. Creating Events: Key Setup Steps
22. Advanced Event Options: Registration Types, Workshops & More
23. Configuring Delegate Types & Event Custom Fields
24. Managing Event Registrations & Attendance
25. The Member Experience: Event Registration Online
26. Using the Service Desk: AI Training & Web Forms
27. Configuring CPD: Cycles vs Streams & CPD Activity Types
28. Managing CPD: Tools for Administrators and the Member Experience
29. Approving & Auditing CPD Logs
30. System Logs
31. Communications: Broadcast email & SMS
32. Email deliverability tools

### Content Management System (CMS)

1. CMS Introduction: Managing Your Website Content
2. Front-End vs Back-End: Layout & Branding Explained
3. Content Editor Basics: Heading Styles, Images, Links & More
4. Overview of Upcoming CMS videos
5. Building the Home Page: Banners, Panels & Teasers
6. Inner Pages & Navigation Menus
7. Content Components
8. News Feed
9. Online shop
10. Profile Directories
11. Website Forms
12. Polls & Surveys
13. Employment Ads
14. Discussion Forums
15. Rotating Banner Ads
16. Using the File Repository & Linking Files in Content
17. Misc Pagelets, Legal Pages & Social Links
18. Advanced CMS Tools: SEO, Layouts, Styling & Custom Code

- [What’s included in the online training](#whats-included-in-the-online-training)
  - [Introduction to Membes AMS](#introduction-to-membes-ams)
  - [Configuration](#configuration)
  - [Association Management System (AMS)](#association-management-system-ams)
  - [Content Management System (CMS)](#content-management-system-cms)
